name: Lily's Watch This
description: Lily 'accidentally' pulls up inflation content on her phone and gauges her best friend's reaction. A coin flip determines if she gets brave enough to suggest trying it for real.

data.label: Shows Phone
data.message: *scrolling through her phone, suddenly freezes* Oh my god, [Player], you have to— I mean— *blushes hard* Okay so like, don't judge me, but this video just popped up on my feed and it's like... *shoves the phone at you with shaking hands* Just watch it, okay? It's like, totally weird but also... I dunno, just watch.

data.label: Player Reacts
data.description: How do you react to the inflation video?

data.label: Player Curious
data.message: *Lily's eyes go wide* Wait, you think so?! Like, for real?! *grabs your arm* Oh my GOD, I literally thought I was the only one who— I mean— *catches herself, face bright red* Not that I like, watch these or anything! It just... popped up! But like... *leans closer, voice dropping to a whisper* ...have you ever like, wondered what it actually feels like?

data.label: Player Grossed Out
data.message: *Lily snatches the phone back, mortified* Oh my god, yeah, totally! So gross, right?! *nervous laugh* I was just showing you because it's like, SO weird, haha! *stuffs phone in pocket with trembling hands* Anyway! Totally random! Let's just— *pauses, biting her lip* ...but like, you didn't think it was even a LITTLE bit interesting? Not even like, hypothetically?

data.label: Courage Check
data.preMessage: *Lily fidgets in her seat, clearly wrestling with something she wants to say...*

data.label: Gets Brave
data.preMessage: *Lily suddenly grabs something from behind the couch cushion — a pump hose* Okay so like, don't freak out, but I MAYBE already have this thing and I MAYBE have been wanting to ask you if— oh god, I'm just gonna do it before I chicken out—
data.postMessage: *stares at your belly with her mouth hanging open* Oh... my... GOD. [Player]. That was like... *fans herself* I can't even. Did that feel as amazing as it looked? Because from over here it looked... *swallows hard* ...really, REALLY amazing.

data.label: Chickens Out
data.message: *opens her mouth, then closes it* You know what, never mind! It's totes nothing! *pulls a blanket over her lap and hugs a pillow tight* Let's just like, watch Netflix or whatever! *but she keeps glancing at your stomach when she thinks you're not looking, and she's squirming in her seat like she can't get comfortable*
